title: Autism, Languages, and Cultures

title: HCAS Fellows Secure Permanent Academic Positions
content: HCAS Fellows Secure Permanent Academic Positions visiiri@helsinki.fi Mon, 02/02/2026 - 13:29 HCAS Fellows Olesya Khanina and Michael Yoshitaka Erlewine have secured permanent academic positions. Khanina will begin a full professorship at the University of Helsinki in Fall 2026, while Erlewine has taken up a permanent research position at the French National Center for Scientific Research (CNRS). Two HCAS Core Fellows have recently secured permanent academic positions during their fellowships. Ol...
creator: visiiri@helsinki.fi

title: Antti Klemetti väittelee aiheesta Käytännön menetelmiä kustannustehokkaaseen syväoppimiseen
content: Antti Klemetti defends his PhD thesis on Practical Approaches to Cost-Efficient Deep Learning ronkaine@helsinki.fi Mon, 02/02/2026 - 11:02 On Friday the 13th of February 2026, M.Sc. Antti Klemetti defends his PhD thesis on Practical Approaches to Cost-Efficient Deep Learning: Taxonomy, Experiments, and Industry Insights. title: CONCEPT WORKSHOP 1/26
content: CONCEPT WORKSHOP 1/26 aipi@helsinki.fi Sun, 01/02/2026 - 14:19 Concept Workshop - Christian Right and Anti-Gender Time: 30.1.-1.2. Location: University of Helsinki, Topelias Participants: Tuija Pulkkinen, Julian Honkasalo, Katja Kahlina, Aino Pietiläinen This is the third whole weekend-long Concept Workshop. title: Luonnontieteellinen museo suljetaan huoltoviikon ajaksi
content: The Natural History Museum will be closed during the maintenance week johanemi@helsinki.fi Fri, 09/01/2026 - 14:10 The museum will be closed during the maintenance week, Mon–Fri, 12–16 January 2026. The doors will reopen on Saturday, 17 January. The Natural History Museum will be closed during the maintenance week, Mon–Fri, 12–16 January. The week's tasks include small repair works and thorough cleaning of the exhibitions, such as vacuuming dioramas and washing the dinosaur. The museum will be o...

title: Arkadiankadun siltaremontti aiheuttaa muutoksia liikennejärjestelyihin Luonnontieteellisen museon lähistöllä
content: Renewal of Arkadiankatu Bridge will cause changes to traffic arrangements near the Natural History Museum johanemi@helsinki.fi Wed, 07/01/2026 - 08:40 The renovation is expected to be completed in late 2026. title: Kotina metsä -näyttely tuo luonnonmetsän keskelle Helsinkiä
content: Forest Home – Exhibition brings a natural forest to the heart of Helsinki johanemi@helsinki.fi Fri, 30/05/2025 - 14:09 In Finland, natural forests have become a rarity – and for many, they remain unfamiliar. The Forest Home exhibition invites visitors to discover them through photography, video installations and scientific specimens. Forest Home is on display at the Natural History Museum until 5 April 2026. Photographic artists Ritva Kovalainen and Sanni Seppo explore the rich life of natural f...
creator: johanemi@helsinki.fi

title: Ukrainan sota - yliopiston suositukset
content: The War in Ukraine – University of Helsinki guidelines terojuut@helsinki.fi Fri, 04/03/2022 - 14:11 This page contains up-to-date information on the effects of the war in Ukraine on the University of Helsinki as well as University-level recommendations and instructions regarding the situation. The University of Helsinki has condemned the military action by Russia and expressed its support for Ukraine and its university community. title: Eläinlääketieteellisen tiedekunnan uusi dekanaatti aloitti työnsä 1.1.2026
